@startuml
!theme aws-orange

skinparam defaultFontSize 12
title Multi-Language Example / 多语言示例 / 多言語の例

class User {
  -name: String
  -email: String
  +login()
  +logout()
}

class 订单_Order_注文 as Order {
  -orderId: String
  -amount: Double
  +create()
  +pay()
}

class Product_产品_製品 as Product {
  -name: String
  -price: Double
  +getPrice()
}

User --> Order : creates
Order --> Product : contains

note right of User
  English: User can create orders
  中文: 用户可以创建订单
  Japanese: ユーザーは注文を作成できます
end note

@enduml
